milestones.description: Viv Richards and Holding's 106-run partnership is the highest for the 10th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 71 between Andy Roberts and Joel Garner
Allan Lamb and Neil Foster's 47-run partnership is ENG's highest for the 9th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 43 between Bob Willis and Bob Taylor
Viv Richards and Baptiste's 59-run partnership is WI's highest for the 8th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 54 between Clive Lloyd and Holding
Viv Richards and Holding's 106-run partnership is WI's highest for the 10th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 71 between Andy Roberts and Joel Garner
Viv Richards's 189 is the highest individual score in ODIs (for WI), surpassing Viv Richards's 153
Viv Richards has broken the record for most runs in boundaries (114) in an innings in ODIs for WI, going past Viv Richards's 98
Viv Richards has broken the record for most runs in boundaries (114) in an innings in ODIs, going past Kapil Dev's 100
Viv Richards's 189 is the highest individual score in ODIs, surpassing Kapil Dev's 175

stories.title: Four six-fors in a Test, and the highest last-wicket stand in ODIs
stories.seoTitle: Ask Steven: Four six-fors in a Test, and the highest last-wicket stand in ODIs
stories.summary: Also: who missed the largest number of Tests over the course of a career?

stories.title: From 334 to 481: the rise of the highest ODI total
stories.subTitle: England v Australia, 3rd ODI, Trent Bridge
stories.seoTitle: From 334 to 481: the rise of the highest ODI total
stories.summary: In every decade since the 1970s, teams have set new records for ODI totals, breaching the 300-run and then the 400-run mark.

image.caption: England's record total displayed on the Trent Bridge scoreboard
